Gloss: I forgive; I allow; I dismiss
right; ἐν δεξιᾷ (χειρί) on the right (hand)
if, whether; εἴτε...εἴτε, whether...or,if...if (= εἰ + τέ)
now, at present; νυνί, at this moment (emphatic form)
not, nor; οὔτε...οὔτε, neither...nor (= οὐ + τέ)
and, but, also (postpositive) (synonym of δέ but more "literary")
